title: Prayer tutor

properties.name: description
properties.value: Yauchomi, the Prayer tutor, is a non-player character located in Lumbridge. She teaches the basics of the Prayer skill to players with lower Prayer levels, and advanced Prayer techniques to those with higher Prayer levels.

NPC ID3223

Yauchomi, the Prayer tutor, is a non-player character located in Lumbridge. She teaches the basics of the Prayer skill to players with lower Prayer levels, and advanced Prayer techniques to those with higher Prayer levels.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.

Yauchomi, the '''Prayer tutor''', is a [[non-player character]] located in [[Lumbridge]]. She teaches the basics of the [[Prayer]] [[Skills|skill]] to players with lower Prayer levels, and advanced Prayer techniques to those with higher Prayer levels.
